What is Money Quiz?

Description:

The Money Quiz will test your general knowledge about key historical events that have shaped our modern economic system.

The quiz is offered to you in two options:
-One long version which contains the 50 questions - Long Quiz
-A shorter version that select, randomly, 10 out of the 50 questions - Short Quiz

Rules:

You may select a nickname to play the game.
To answer, you need to type a Year in the following format YYYY. For example "1979".
In case of correct or incorrect answer, a Wikipedia link for further reading will be provided.
A scoring system will allow you to track how you are doing.

Enjoy playing The Money Quiz!
